name: Parmesan Corn
comments: This is Brian's favorite corn recipe! I usually dislike recipes that don't give specific amounts, but this one really depends on the cook's taste; plus, it allows you flexibility when making greater or lesser amounts of corn.
ingredients: to taste: butter, parmesan cheese, Italian seasoning and salt
instructions: Cook corn according to package directions; drain water and pour corn into bowl. Stir in remaining ingredients, adding amounts of each until dish has an irresistible flavor.
